subject: Just thought you should know
body:
Website Alert:
 
In the past few months several sites have been advertising our
products.  The products they are advertising are generic versions and not
the “real” deal.  We are advising our customers to look for
the genuine © logos on our sites.
 
Don’t forget to use your secure link below when viewing our
website.  By using your personalized link you are ensured security and
custom discounts based on your previous purchases.
 
Secure Custom Address:
http://The00.zfeuranner.com/ordertoday.php
 
Have a great day
 
 




Attention:  This email was sent on behalf
of viagonline Trademarks.  More information can be found at:
http://www.zfeuranner.com/ordertoday.php
